p: In both the analysed strains, lutein was the most abundant carotenoid, followed by Î²-carotene, the only carotenoids present ( Table 4). The Golden Nistari strain always had a higher total carotenoid content with respect to the White Polyhybrid regardless of the rearing substrate. Considering the feeding substrate, pupae fed on the artificial diet had a lower carotenoid content when compared with those fed with fresh leaves.
